title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

Section
54-e
of the

State Finance Law, as enacted by Laws of 1978, chapter 741, provides for the

State of New York to reimburse municipalities for their firefighting costs
incurred while fighting a fire on property under the jurisdiction of the State
of New York. This Part implements, that law and governs the application
procedure and scope of coverage of the law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
425.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
